email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. We were hoping for something in the mid-40s. Can you check if the owner is willing to come down to $45.50 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed with the owner, and they are willing to lower the rate to $48.00 per ton, but that's their final offer. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $48.00 per ton, but we need the demurrage rate to be capped at $12,000 per day. Can you confirm this with the owner? Also, please send over the full vessel details and the draft charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the owner has agreed to cap the demurrage at $12,000 per day. I’ve attached the full vessel details and the draft charter party for your review. Please let me know if you need any further clarifications. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the charter at $48.00 per ton and the demurrage capped at $12,000 per day. Please confirm the laycan dates and we’ll finalize the paperwork. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, confirmed. The laycan remains 15-20 October. I’ll send over the final charter party for signature shortly. Thanks for your cooperation and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best, Sarah
